# TraceHelper class

Utility class that defines the trace source of the model layer's log messages. Trace name is 'CRA.ModelLayer' (this is the name to be used in the applications configuration files to listen to this trace).

```csharp
public static class TraceHelper
```

## Public Members

| name | description |
| --- | --- |
| static [AddListener](TraceHelper/AddListener.md)(…) | Add a listener to the source |
| static [TraceEvent](TraceHelper/TraceEvent.md)(…) | Trace a log event |
